reviewText:
It was in great condition, plays as a brand new dvd, will treasure it forever.
Dolly is such an entertainer and inspiration to any who give her the chance to speak to them through her great talent.

It was good.  Nuff said.

here are your remaining words:
Do explain why you liked or disliked this product.
Do compare to similar products and share how long you've used this product.
Do identify specific attributes (e.g. comfort & fit of a shirt or the battery life of a camera) and whether they met your expectations.

It was not as what it was expected from a DVD. The picture quality is terrible and so is the sound quality. Some pirated DVDs have better picture quality than it does! And to make matters worse, it was not a Live Concert at all. In a Live Concerts there is continuity between songs/performances. In this case, each song is performed separately from the next like a music video or listening to a CD. It was lousy and very very disappointing.
